ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Central Auditory Dysfunction (Right Hemisphere Lesion)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Normal peripheral hearing with severe deficits on central tests (dichotic, temporal patterning) and abnormal MLR, consistent with the known right insula lesion.

ordered_list.rationale_short: Baseline assessment of peripheral hearing sensitivity.
Assessment of speech recognition ability in quiet.
Evaluation of central auditory processing abilities given the neurological history.
Electrophysiological assessment of the central auditory pathway.

expected_interpretations_by_visit.collective_interpretation: Peripheral hearing sensitivity and speech recognition in quiet were normal. However, central auditory evaluation revealed severe deficits consistent with a right hemisphere lesion affecting the insula. There was a marked 'left ear effect' on dichotic and monaural low-redundancy speech tasks, and bilateral deficits on temporal patterning tasks. The MLR was abnormal/unusual with reduced Pa waves.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: Word recognition scores were normal bilaterally (RE 88%, LE 92%).

tests.name: Central Behavioral Tests
tests.result_summary: Abnormal. Marked left ear deficits on Dichotic Rhyme (~10%), Competing Sentences (0%), Dichotic Digits (~50%), Compressed Speech (~55%), and Low Pass Filtered Speech. Bilateral deficits on Frequency Patterns (~10%).

tests.name: Middle Latency Response (MLR)
tests.result_summary: Difficult to interpret/unusual. Pa wave reduced or non-replicable in most conditions; Left Ear T4 tracing showed the best Pa. Na waves present with normal latencies.

counseling_actions: Explain that peripheral hearing is normal but the brain struggles to process complex signals, especially from the left side.
Discuss the correlation between the left ear deficits and the right-sided brain lesion.
Highlight that auditory performance may be compromised in challenging listening environments despite lack of subjective complaints.

escalation.rationale_short: Patient is already under neurologic monitoring for the known lesion and seizures.

follow_up_plan.objective: Patient moved away before definite diagnosis or follow-up could be established.
